member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to respect RunAODAFlag.

member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout threshold to use.

member.summary: Gets or sets the warning threshold. Warning must be less than Timeout.

member.summary: Gets or sets the datafile.

member.summary: Gets or sets the CSV file location.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.LogSaveLocation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the log save location.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.ReportSaveLocation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the log save location.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.ScreenShotSaveLocation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the screenshot save location.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.AutomationProgram
member.summary:
Gets or sets the Testing driver to use.
If not set, will use Selenium.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.TestSetDataType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of data to use for the test set.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.TestCaseDataType
member.summary:
Gets or sets the type of data to use for the test case.
If not set, will use the test set data type.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.TestStepDataType
member.summary:
Gets or sets the type of data to use for the test step.
If not set, will use the test case data type.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.TestSetDataArgs
member.summary: Gets or sets the arguments for the test set test data. Most often it is the location of the file.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.TestCaseDataArgs
member.summary:
Gets or sets the arguments for the test case test data. Most often the location of the file.
If not set, will use the test set args.

member.name: P:AutomationTestingProgram.FrameworkOptions.TestStepDataArgs
member.summary:
Gets or sets the arguments for the test step test data. Most often the location of the file.
If not set, will use the test case args.
